title: Is Brazil now a dictatorship under Bolsonaro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, sure. The Congress has been dissolved, like Venezuela, the army is on the streets and all Judiciary is in prison… All this in the leftists mind only… Bolsonaro was elected by vote, Congress continue to not work as before him, as well as Judiciary. And, by the way, the economy started growing again. From where do you got this complete misinformation?
